title: TOGGLE_SHOW_OPTIONAL_STUNT_JUMP_CAMERA
content:
0xFB80AB299D2EE1BD// ToggleShowOptionalStuntJumpCamera
void TOGGLE_SHOW_OPTIONAL_STUNT_JUMP_CAMERA(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: Set to true to enable the optional stunt jump camera angles, or false to disable them and use the default camera view.Enable/disable optional stunt camera.NativeDB Introduced: v757
